item.title: BTFM iOS
item.description: Device Info Get UDID in different ways (using MacOS): ioreg -p IOUSB -l | grep "USB Serial" idevice_id -l # get UDID with ideviceinstaller system_profiler SPUSBDataType | sed -n -e '/iPad/,/Serial/p;/iPhone/,/Serial/p;/iPod/,/Serial/p' | grep "Serial Number:" # instruments -s devices Get BootROM version (old or new).

item.title: BTFM Android
item.description: Better also use a cheatsheet at the very beginning of forensic analysis or application testing and fill out all necessary information to further ease the analysis.

item.title: RTFM iOS
item.description: Application OSINT Table: Information ANSWER iDevice UDID Package name App’s folder with bin (UUID) App’s folder with data (UUID) Paths # get App's folder with data (UUID) and App's folder with bin (UUID).
